name: Only One Shot! (AdinDuDe)
description:
!!! Updates Will come Here and There !!!

!!! FYI THIS GAME WAS MADE FOR ENTERTAINMENT, AND FOR A SCRATCH REVIVAL !!!

In OnlyOneShot! You play as a small kid in his Jammies, who was thrown into the bunker by his sacrificed parents. A bomb drops and you must try to survive 26 days Through, Mutants, Leaks, Air Tanks, And More!

All Coding - AdinDuDe 

Art - AdinDuDe

Music - AdinDuDe

Some Ideas - Friends, Family.

As you can see its mainly a one man project.

you will get a custom day creator for when you complete story mode!!!

qna

Q: What Software did you use for music? 

A: GarageBand, on PC

Q: What did you code this in?

A: Entirely on Scratch.

Q: My Game lags, any way to fix it?

A: you may die on a area that lagged, but once you go over it, it won't lag anymore, and you might need a tiiiny better pc. But all pcs can play the game.

!!! PLEASE REPORT ANY BUGS !!!
